oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ekološka poljoprivreda u razvoju hrvatskog sela
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Čižek, Jan
Znaor, Darko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Farm economics
Farming Systems
Social aspects
Food systems
Policy environments and social economy
Environmental aspects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper provides an overview of the potential environmental, economic and social benefits of organic farming for the Croatian rural areas. It also discusses the concept and philosophy of organic farming, its yields, environmental and economic performance.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Croatian Academy of Sciences and Arts
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Čižek, Jan and Znaor, Darko (1994) Ekološka poljoprivreda u razvoju hrvatskog sela. [The role of ecological agriculture in development of Croatian rural areas.] In: roceedings of the scientific conference "Agriculture and food production in new European surroundings", Croatian Academy of Sciences and Arts, Zagreb, pp. 75-84.
